fields.description:
When i run my android device with my application Ä± get this issue message. If you have any solution method or idea about this issue can you help me ?
usr/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/longjohn/dist/longjohn.js:185
        throw e;
              ^
TypeError: Cannot read property 'length' of undefined

comments.body:
Please attach the output of the following commands to investigate further

1. Titanium info
2. Titanium sdk
3. Titanium config

Also, not sure what OS you are using. For some members changing the OS to english resolves the issue.
Resolving the ticket as we have not got the requested information. We will be happy to reopen the ticket once we hear back from the reporter.
